extendedInfo.description: With the SiriusXM Internet Radio App, you can listen to SiriusXMâs sports, talk,  comedy, entertainment and commercial-free music programming on your Android smartphone or tablet.  Plus, now you can access hundreds of On Demand shows and use MySXM to personalize many of your favorite SiriusXM music and comedy channels â so you hear more of what you want and less of what you donât.  You can even store select On Demand content on your device so you can still listen even when you don't have Internet access. SiriusXM Internet Radio subscription is required. For more information visit: www.siriusxm.com/internetradioAbout This Applicationâ¢ Stream SiriusXM channels live, including exclusive online-only channels â¢ Personalize many of your favorite music and comedy channels with MySXM â¢ Get On Demand access to our large catalog of content and listen on your schedule â¢ Store select talk and entertainment shows for a period of time so you can listen even while offline.â¢ Pause, Fast Forward and Rewind live radio and On Demand content â¢ Hear shows from the beginning, even if you've just tuned to that channel, with Start Now â¢ Track your favorite Shows and receive notifications when new episodes are available â¢ Automatically hear currently playing songs from the beginning when tuning to music channels with TuneStart

reviews.title: Fix the minimize issue
reviews.comment: Make it so I can minimize this and still continue to listen. Once that is returned I\'ll give it the five stars back. Otherwise this app is useless to me.
reviews.author: Chris Offutt

reviews.title: Baffling App...Does Sirius hate us?!?
reviews.comment: How can the service be unavailable with a perfect Wi-Fi signal? Why no landscape mode after yrs of complaints? Why is this the only music app that regularly cuts out? Why is this the only music app that renders my phone incapable of other activities while running? Why is the scroll bar so small as to be semi-functional? Why no widget with minimal functionality? Why no pause ability without fully opening the app? Why an app team completely unresponsive to customer requests?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Latest update constant pausing
reviews.comment: Droid RAZR Maxx HD - updated on 7/17. Now audio player pauses every few minutes by itself. Previously, I could listen for hours with no issue. Stop messing things up!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incredible
reviews.comment: Not sure which is better... The constant \'On Demand isn\'t available\' message, the way the buttons don\'t respond to touch, the unusable seek bar, the random disappearance of downloaded content that has yet to expire or the countless other things that don\'t work. Or maybe it\'s that I have to pay extra for all of it.   Why don\'t you invest a little of the money from your subscriptions to pay developers who know how to build an app that works consistently!!!
reviews.author: Marcus England

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: The music selection is awesome but it doesn\'t seem to work in the background can\'t do any other functions while Sirius XM is running on your phone my other music apps can be minimized. they run perfectly in the background while I multitask on my phone if they fix this then it would be a five star app.. Samsung Galaxy s3
reviews.author: Damion Clarke

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: Once again II ... Another update and no real fixes.  The app NEEDS to be able to rotate.   Come on devs....  Pull your head out of your a$$ and do a proper fix.  Version 2.2     Now at version 2.6 and STILL cannot use the phone in LANDSCAPE mode.  WTF!!!!!!!!!  How many people need to comment and tell you to fix this??  Hey another hint.. Enable the MENU button.  You hide the settings in the scrolling menu at the bottom.
reviews.author: Bill Brodie

reviews.title: It hard to close this app.
reviews.comment: I  stop the process but the icon is still in the notification bar. I have to force stop. That why I downgrade this app from a 5 to a 4.
reviews.author: Michelangelo Smith

reviews.title: Great App - Works As Advertised
reviews.comment: I love listening to the play-by-play baseball games when I can\'t be home to watch the game... MySXM works just as I\'d expect on the 70\'s channel... and I love that I can listen to some really interesting OnDemand interviews offline when flying for work... Solid app - I use it regularly...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Barely functional!
reviews.comment: No landscape mode, slide bar is useless, if you\'re not a Stern fan don\'t bother with this app. There are much better working music apps available.
reviews.author: Douglas Sardelli

reviews.title: Service Unavailable
reviews.comment: I have no idea if this app sucks or not because I can\'t get past the sign up screen. It keeps telling me the service is unavailable so I\'m just going to assume that it sucks.  Update: 7/23/13 still can\'t log in, still sucks. I have uninstalled the app and sent the developer a lengthy email describing why they should choose a different profession.
reviews.author: Walter Westmoreland

reviews.title: NEEP WP8 AND HTML5 SUPPORT
reviews.comment: SIRIUS XM NEEDS A WINDOWS PHONE 8 APP SO I CAN LISTEN ON ALL MY DEVICES. I DO LOVE THIS APP AS I CAN HEAR ALL MY SPORTS PLUS COMMERCIAL FREE MUSIC AND HOWARD STERN AND OPIE AND ANTHONY. LOVE LITHIUM THE 90S ALTERNATIVE STATION. MORE MUSIC AND LESS DJ TALK ON ALL MUSIC CHANNELS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No on demand playing
reviews.comment: Cannot get the on demand to play any of the shows that are listed as my favorite. This is the exact reason why I have this service, to be able to listen to the shows and songs that I miss. Fix this asap! Note 2 T-Mobile
reviews.author: Paul Strength

reviews.title: App Sucks!
reviews.comment: This app cuts off every 10 seconds.  How can anyone listen to this? I\'m paying for this Sirius service and someone needs to fix this app or I will be cancelling my Sirius subscription.  Waste of $.
reviews.author: Jennifer Pirrung

reviews.title: Great app, needs one fix
reviews.comment: Please don\'t put the pause button right under the streaming content . When I try and push pause I jump to a completely different part of the show and that sucks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the app! Only one suggestion...
reviews.comment: Can you guys add lock screen controls like Google Music and SoundCloud have? If so I\'ll change this to 5 stars!
reviews.author: David Parks

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: If your having issues with presses and playback pauses without reason, try uninstalling the app, power down, and reinstall. That process resolved all my issues.
reviews.author: Wayland Bugg

reviews.title: Pooor
reviews.comment: Service temporarily unavailable comes up Constantly. you\'d think they would have their shi* together after all this time.
reviews.author: Rob Farina

reviews.title: ...really?
reviews.comment: Always says unavailable,  when it does work it constantly stops and the only way to get it playing again is to pause and then go to live...If it wasn\'t for o & a I would have dropped your service years ago
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: On demand fail
reviews.comment: I have three shows I download every night that get me through my next work day.  For the last week, I\'ve not been able to dl any.  Long work week.... get it together.  You see the reviews.  Do something about it.
reviews.author: Angela Walker

reviews.title: Quality doesn\'t match subscription price
reviews.comment: This app should not time out! Furthermore, a widget should be available.  Also, the on demand shows should auto download.  This app requires a monthly subscription so it should come with excellent service!
reviews.author: Jim McMahan
